title: BlueStacks App Player 0.9.30.4239 (KitKat 4.4.2) [Mod] - AppzDam
description:
The platform allows you to run applications, including games, written for Android OS - on desktops, laptops and tablets. This is a special program that uses a technique called LayerCake, which provides the correct environment to run the ARM-applications for the Android OS on the computer with the Windows operating system.

After installation BlueStacks on your PC with Windows, you can directly from the program download the appropriate Android application, without the need to use the Android-based smartphone. Looks BlueStacks quite gently and naturally fits into the Windows interface. The program allows you to run Android-applications in windowed or full-screen mode, and deal with them will be able to almost all of it has been translated into 12 languages, among which there are Russian.

Notes :

How to copy the game cache files / c computer BlueStacks

Option 1
Necessary for the transfer of files copied to the folder SharedFolder (on Win7 it is on the path C:  ProgramData  BlueStacks  UserData  SharedFolder).
Set in BlueStacks program launch ES File Explorer, click on the icon at the top / left (globe with phone :)) - Local Storage - windows - BstSharedFolder. It and lay the needed files. From picking up where necessary.

Option 2
Use the Android ADB, a plugin for Total Commander is not lower than v7.50
Android ADB is set almost automatically when you open the file in the total. Access to the plug-in is carried out on the menu (button) Network / FS plugins. Which is usually to the left of the drive selection.

Option 3
Use Android Commander (PC), software for Windows, allows you to manage your programs and files
